A catalyst for change

Cannabis Wheaton is fundamentally shifting two paradigms in the Cannabis space – The traditional investment model and how the industry works together. Our platform creates wider channels of opportunities for both investors and cannabis cultivators.

Our foundation is built upon a market-tested model and applied with a fresh approach by leading experts in the cannabis industry.

Value, Autonomy and Flexibility

At Cannabis Wheaton, we are focused on creating value for our partners. We have created a platform that promotes new opportunities for success while licensed producers maintain their brand autonomy and gaining access to better scaling flexibility.

We invest and support a wide range of cannabis cultivation companies each of which have different visions, voices and brand values; however they all share a common goal — create a world class industry based on diversity, quality and innovation.

Learn More

Coast-to-Coast Network

We are building a pan-Canadian network of streaming partners that will define the future of the industry. Cannabis Wheaton is laying the groundwork and facilitating the connections between licensed producers, consumers and investors across the country.

Get connected

Our Success is Derived from the Sum of our Parts.

Our management team is comprised of industry ﬁrst-movers, visionaries and thought leaders, dedicated to creating value for our partners and the cannabis industry. Collectively, the individuals of Cannabis Wheaton have a depth of knowledge from retail, branding, finance and technology.
